name: chickenviken
description: A raw chicken meat delivery platform with user and admin apps

scripts.install:all: npm run install:user && npm run install:admin && npm run install:server
scripts.build:all: npm run build:user && npm run build:admin
scripts.deploy:user: npm run build:user && firebase deploy --only hosting:user
scripts.deploy:admin: npm run build:admin && firebase deploy --only hosting:admin
